Key Match Events: Jaden Ivey led the Pistons with 22 points
Post-Match Reflections: Players from both teams consoled both Ivey and Anthony
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit guard Jaden Ivey sustained what appeared to be a severe injury to his lower left leg
Orlando’s Cole Anthony slipped and fell as he and Ivey went for the ball
Members of the training staff held up towels to block the crowd’s view of the injury
Players from both teams formed a circle around him
After a lengthy delay, he was loaded onto a stretcher and wheeled out of the arena with a towel covering the injury
